Package cycling

Class Race

  • java.lang.Object
    • cycling.Race
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Race
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Race encapsulates tour races, each of which has a number of associated Stages.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Race​(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String description)
     throws IllegalNameException,
            InvalidNameException
        Race constructor; creates new race and adds to allRaces array.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new race
        description - The description for the new race
        Throws:
        IllegalNameException - If name already exists in the system
        InvalidNameException - If name is empty/null, contains whitespace, or is longer than 30 characters

      • addStageToRace

        public int addStageToRace​(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          double length,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                          StageType type)
                   throws IllegalNameException,
                          InvalidNameException,
                          InvalidLengthException
        Creates a new stage and adds the ID to the stageIds array.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new stage
        description - The description of the new stage
        length - The length of the new stage (in km)
        startTime - The date and time at which the stage will be held
        type - The StageType, used to determine the point distribution
        Returns:
        The ID of the new stage
        Throws:
        IllegalNameException
        InvalidNameException
        InvalidLengthException

      • addStageToRace

        public static int addStageToRace​(int id,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 double length,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                                 StageType type)
                          throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                                 IllegalNameException,
                                 InvalidNameException,
                                 InvalidLengthException
        Creates a new stage and adds the ID to the stageIds array.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the race to which the stage will be added
        name - The name of the new stage
        description - The description of the new stage
        length - The length of the new stage (in km)
        startTime - The date and time at which the stage will be held
        type - The StageType, used to determine the point distribution
        Returns:
        The ID of the new stage
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If no race exists with the requested ID
        IllegalNameException
        InvalidNameException
        InvalidLengthException

      • removeStageFromRace

        public static void removeStageFromRace​(int id,
                                       int stageId)
                                throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Removes a stageId from the array of stageIds for a race instance, as well as from the static array of all stages in the Stage class.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the race to which the stage will be removed
        stageId - The ID of the stage to be removed
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If no stage exists with the requested ID
